alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Bleckley; Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:58AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bibb, Twiggs, central Bleckley and northeastern Houston Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 958 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Robins AFB, or 13 miles northeast of Perry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jeffersonville, Warner Robins, Robins AFB, Marion, Coley Station, Tarversville, Robins Air Force Base, Sand Bed, Bullard, Fitzpatrick, Magnolia, Ripley, Huber, Royal, District Path, Elberta, Cary, Bonaire and Kathleen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
